game.title: The Lost Treasure
game.description: Embark on an epic adventure to find the long-lost treasure of the ancient civilization. Solve puzzles, overcome challenges, and explore mysterious locations to uncover the secret location of the treasure.
game.reward: Ancient artifact and a chest of gold

task.description: Investigate the clues and decipher the symbols on the ancient map to unveil the location of the hidden treasure.
Find the key that unlocks the secret entrance to the underground cave where the treasure is believed to be hidden.
Defeat the ancient Guardian that protects the treasure. Face challenges, solve riddles, and prove your worth to claim the treasure.
